body.name: Tangkula Bookshelves and Bookcases, 80 Inch Double Wide 6 Tier Bookshelf, Industrial Vintage Large Etagere Bookshelf, Open Display Shelves with Metal Frame for Home Office (60'' L x 13.5'' W x 80" H)
features: 📚【Double Storage with Open Design】This double bookshelf with 12 open tiers is larger than normal 6 tier bookshelf. It is wide enough to hold the printer, books and media devices in your room, which is a great solution to keep your room tidy. Open shelf design allows your items to be fully displayed and quickly picked up.

🌵【Industrial & Multi-purpose Shelf】Coming with wood grain color and black metal frame, this 6 tier bookshelf is a piece of stylish and elegant furniture which can be easily matched with other decoration in your house. This bookcase can be used as a bookshelf, flower stand or display rack to be placed in home or even in bookstores, office and other places.

🏵️【Protection Device for Safety】Anti-slip foot pads are equipped to protect the floor from scratches and increase the stability of shelf. What’s more, our bookcase and bookshelf is equipped with tilting prevention device which can tightly fasten the shelf to the wall. You no longer have to worry about the danger of accidental falls on shelf.

☘️【Selective Material for Solid Construction】 Crafted with thick MDF board and premium metal frame, this 80"H bookshelf has a satisfying weight capacity which is sturdy and sustainable enough to be used for long time. The back X - shaped brackets at back will prevent the shelf from wobble, increasing the stability and safety.

📚【Easy to Assemble and Clean】Numbered hardware and illustrated instructions are included for easy and quick installation. You can finish the assembly within short period of time without help. Besides, because of the waterproof and rustproof materials, you can clean it easily-- just wipe with a soft cloth to get rid of the dust.
body.description: DescriptionChange any wall in your home to a classic decoration by using our double wide 6-tier bookshelf! Made of durable MDF board and rustproof metal frame, this shelf can stand the test of time. Double design provides 12 tiers of compartments, creating more storage space for your home without taking up too much space. Non-slip foot pads and tilting prevention device provide comprehensive protection for your family's safety. Our retro industrial bookshelf is composed of black metal frame and wooden board, which go very well together. This bookshelf can be a great addition to your living room, sturdy, balcony and so on. Our 6 tier storage shelf will bring more possibilities to your life.FeaturePremium MDF board and metal frame make it sturdy and durableX-shaped framework reinforces the shelf and provides stability12 open shelves are spacious for storing different kinds of books and showpiecesThick board with tightly welded screws provides good load-bearing capacityDouble wide design provide more space while saving spaceNon-slip foot pads can protect your floor from scratching and reduce noiseIndustrial and retro style matches your home decoration harmoniouslySuitable for being used as a bookcase, tool shelf and display rackEasy to assemble and clean for saving your time and energySpecificationMaterial: MDF and metalColor: brown+ blackProduct Dimensions: 60''x 13.5'' x 80"(L x W x H) Height between each layer: 13.5''Weight Capacity of Each Shelf: 135 lbsNet Weight: 52.5 lbsPackage Includes: 1 x 6-Tier Bookshelf 1 x Instruction

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, looks great and holds plenty of picture frames, books and anything else that you might want to store or display

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This rack is great and easy to assemble. It is everything I wanted in a bookshelf and more . They come packaged in two separate boxes which I think better protect the contents. Delivery was quick and on time. It ready beautiful and sturdy, nice color style and everything! Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine bookshelf for the price; color very different than photos
reviews.reviewText: For the cheap price of this bookshelf, it's fine and does the job. However, the color of the "wood" is WAY more red than any of the item photos or feedback photos would lead on. The "wood" shelves are much more red than the photos. Other than this, it's acceptable for the price. Frame/overall build is good and sturdy. I will keep, since it's too expensive to return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: Product came in great shape. Easy to assemble and the shelves are beautiful. I love 3 vertical supports. The price for what you get is awesome. Definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: So pay attention to the fact you have to attach the support bars at the end. The instructions didn't mention it really so I ended up putting half the bars backwards so I wasn't able to attach them properly. When I went to flip the bookcase over it almost came apart, like in half . I did manage to flip it over without too much damage and its sturdy. Im worried if I ever have to move it, so I'll probably have to take it apart. Have patience. Your fingers are going to hurt. Id make sure to have a drill bit attachment. But over all, I really like it. It looks great and its big

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you have assistance, it's heavy.
reviews.reviewText: It's a bookshelf...I put a lot of books on it. I don't have a lot of wall space but I do have taller ceilings. I needed something taller, not wider. This thing is large...and pretty heavy. I'm strong and my husband is much stronger and it took both of us to get it up and standing without it hitting things or falling. I have a lot of heavy stuff on it...books and boxes of photos and it feels solid and stable. I haven't mounted it to the wall yet, I actually bought an "L" bracket rather than using the weird zip tie thing that was included... I had previously ordered a bathroom shelf that also belonged in this line from the same manufacturer...that thing was garbage. I opened it and returned it the same day. I was worried about this one considering it was a bit more expensive and I knew that it needed to be much heavier. I was pleasantly surprised that the quality of this piece is much better than the quality of the bathroom shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Missing 10 of 12 shelves
reviews.reviewText: Really wanted to love this product. It looks beautiful, great size, and style. But when it arrived the box was packed full, but I am missing 10 of 12 shelves. I looked and someone said their's was delivered in two boxes (which was my thought process). However, FedEx says there was only one box received by them. The tracking number on the order only shows one package, and Amazon only shows one package. So now I have a large useless metal stand. I have reach out but heard nothing. Upset would be an understatement.Will update if I finally hear anything...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good shelf.
reviews.reviewText: The installation is very simple.It only took me about 30 minutes. This shelf tidies up my messy room a lot. I like it very much.
